titles.title: Mäṣḥafä gǝnzät “Book of the Funeral Ritual”

shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Mäṣḥafä gǝnzät “Book of the Funeral Ritual” (fols. 3ra-117vb) - Introduction (fols. 3ra-4vb), incomplete. - Discourse of St. Athanasius on death (fols. 12rb-16ra) - Mäṣḥaf zä-wäḍʾat ʾǝm-ʾIyärusalem “Book that Came from Jerusalem” (fols. 20ra-26vb) - Antiphons (kǝśtät, ʾaryam, mäzmur) (fols. 33vb-34va, 50rb-51ra, 81va-vb, 83ra-84ra, 88rb-vb, 90ra, 91va-92ra, 94va-vb, 98ra-rb) - Homily by St. Jacob of Sarug for the funeral of priests and deacons (fols. 53vb-55va) - Lǝfafä ṣǝdq “Bandlet of Righteousness” (fols. 69ra-71va) - Mängädä sämay “Journey to Heaven” (fols. 71va-73rb) - Homily by ʾabba Sälama, Metropolitan of Ethiopia (fols. 77va-79vb) - Mäṣḥafä ʾardǝʾǝt “Book of Disciples” (fols. 115va-117vb, 1ra-vb)
Additio 1.

donors.donor: According to Additio 1, the Ms. was purchased and donated by Gäbrä Maryam.

dcomments.dcomment: Metropolitan ʾabba Sälama (in tenure 1841-68) is mentioned in the supplication formulas on fols. 30rb, 45vb.

txstates.txstate: Both boards are missing. The Ms. is worn and shows traces of intensive use. Many fols. are stained with wax and water. Some fols. are misplaced (e.g., fol. 3v should follow 8r, fol. 1r should follow 117v) Some fols. are damaged by insects (e.g., fols. 2, 7, 9). The parchment of fol. 20r-v is translucent, affecting the legibility of the text. Fols. 2v, 3r, 7r are strongly discoloured. Holes crudely amended on fols. 13, 1, 46, 49, 70, 75, 79, 85, 106, 108, 114v.

bindings.binding: Two boards (both missing). Two pairs of sewing stations.

squires.squire: A(2/fols. 1r-2v) – B(2/fols. 3r-4v) – C(2/fols. 5r-6v) – I(7/fols. 7r-13v) – II(9/fols. 14r-22v) – III(8; s.l.: 2, stub after 7; 7, stub after 2/fols. 23r-30v) – IV(7; s.l.: 6, stub after 2/fols. 31r-37v) – V(8/fols. 38r-45v) – VI(8/fols. 46r-53v) – VII(8/fols. 54r-61v) – VIII(8/fols. 62r-69v) – IX(8/fols. 70r-77v) – X(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 5; 7, stub after 1/fols. 78r-85v) – XI(8/fols. 86r-93v) – XII(8/fols. 94r-101v) – XIII(8/fols. 102r-109v) – XIV(8; s.l.: 4, stub after 5; 7, stub after 1/fols. 110r-117v).

taunit.rl-info:
Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.
The bottom ruled line was not used by the scribe on fols. 14r-v, 54va. The scribe disregarded the ruling on fol. 24r.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; a few lines on the incipit page and fol. 7r, alternating with black lines; two initial lines of each section; names of Hebrew letters in Ps. 118 (e.g., fols. 35va, 37vb, 38vb); abbreviations; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals; some other words like, halle luya (e.g., fols. 5ra, 12va), ṣällǝyu (e.g., fols. 16ra, 17va), ʾәgäle (e.g., fols. 18va, 28ra), wä-yәbälu (e.g., fols. 24va, 25rb), kǝśtät (e.g., fols. 33vb, 50rb).

abbreviations.abbreviation: ሃ ሃ ሃ for ሃሌ፡ ሉያ፡ (e.g., fols. 13ra, 14va) ይ፡ ካ፡ for ይበል፡ ካሕን፡ (e.g., fols. 30rb, 32vb, 61rb) ይ፡ ዲ፡ for ይበል፡ ዲያቆን፡ (e.g., fols. 30rb, 32vb, 86va) ይ፡ ሕ፡ for ይበል፡ ሕዝብ፡ (e.g., fols. 30rb, 37ra, 61va)

additional.det: Gäbrä Maryam is mentioned as the commissioner and the donor.

extras.extra: - Corrections written interlineally: e.g., fols. 10vb, 13ra, 27ra, 69rb. - Chains of black and red dots as text dividers: fols. 11ra, 18vb, 27ra. - The scribe used compressed script on fols. 33vb-34va, 50rb-51ra, 81va-vb, 83ra-84ra, 88rb-88vb, 90ra, 91va-92ra, 94va-vb, 98ra-rb. - Pen trials: fols. 3r, 5v.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Notes in the upper margins referring to the content of the Ms., in the main hand: fols. 8v, 9v, 10r, 12r, 18v, 20ra, 27r, 30v, 38v, 40r, 41v, 47v, 53r, 62r, 77v, 82v, 86v, 89r, 91r, 92v, 95v, 96r, 97v, 98v, 100r, 102r, 103v. - Daily readings are indicated by the names of days of the week written in the upper margin on fols.: ዘሰሉስ: fol. 116rb ዘረቡዕ: fol. 117vb ዘሐሙስ: fol. 117va ዘአርብ: fol. 117vb - Coloured thread has been inserted into the outer margins of fols. 17, 20.

frames.frame: Fol. 6ra: simple coloured (black, red) ornamental band; geometric motifs. Fol. 12rb: simple coloured (black, red) ornamental band; geometric motifs. Fol. 20ra: simple coloured (black, red) ornamental band; geometric motifs. Fol. 73rb: simple coloured (black, red) ornamental band; geometric motifs. Fol. 115rb: simple coloured (black, red) ornamental band; geometric motifs.
